====== Blank Template ======


===== About =====
A ''blank'' template is the simplest layout of all because it does not support any [[:docs:theme:element:element|layout elements]].

It will just print the [[:docs:theme:element:main|page content]] [[:docs:theme:element:container|contained]].
===== Usage =====

This layout is mainly used:
  * to export/print the content.
  * to integrate the page into another website.


===== Example =====


[[?template=blank|Click on this link to see the blank template in action]]
